ENV.description: Set this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.(Don't Need To Change It)

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill your Full name. By default it is ANKIT

ALIVE_MSG.description: Set Custom Alive Message When entering .alive Or .nvs  Command.

ABUSE.description: Set ON or OFF. It Will Activate Abuse Plugin According To Ur Value Fill

EXTRA_PLUGIN.description: Set ON or OFF. It Will Activate Extra Plugin AccordingTo Ur Value Fill

SPAM.description: Set ON or OFF. It Will Activate Spam Assistant According To Ur Value Fill

ASSISTANT.description: Set ON or OFF. It Will Activate Ur Assistant From Bot Father Start And See

YOUR_GROUP.description: Set Your Group Username. By Default It Is (@NoUB_CHAT)

BOY_OR_GIRL.description: Set Boy Or Girl. It Will Set Boy Like Boy Bot Else Set Like Girl Bot And Its Design

AWAKE_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for awake pic in .awake Or .bot command.

HELP_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for OP pic in .op command.

PING_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for PING pic in .ping command.

ALIVE_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for alive pic in .alive.

ALIVE_EMOJI.description: Put here any emoji. Which Will be Show When U Do .alive.

BIO_MSG.description: Put Your Telegram Bio Here Required For Auto Bio.
BIO_MSG.value: I Am Pro Person Because I am Navodayan üáÆüá≥.

PM_PIC.description: put here any telegraph media link for custom pmpermit pic.

PM_MSG.description: Enter Your custom pm permit msg.
PM_MSG.value:
Hello I Am Assistant.
PM Security Of My Owner To Protect From Spammers. Dont Spam Here Else Get Ban By Me

MAX_FLOOD_IN_PM.description: Set Spam Number After That He Get Blocked By Deafault It Is (3)

LOGGER_ID.description: Create a Private Group With Add @MissRose_bot Do /id. Value Should Be Start With -

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.

SUDO_USERS.description: Its Sudo Access To Give Bot Access To Ur Friend.

SUDO_COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: Please enter sudo user command handler

HANDLER.description: U can Change Ur command Handler By Default it is (.)

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value May result In Account Ban.

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Paste Group Id Which U Get From @missrose_bot

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and copy the username of your bot.

NO_OF_BUTTONS.description: Set The Amount Of Buttons Displayed In legend Command default 10

NO_OF_COLUMNS.description: Set The Amount Of Rows You Want To Displayed In legend Command default 2

HELP_EMOJI1.description: Set The emojies You Want to Add In Help Command!!

HELP_EMOJI2.description: Set The emojies You Want to Add In Help Command!!

PM_DATA.description: Type OFF if you want to disable pm protection...
